Uses of Class
entities.Player

Packages that use Player
Package Description
controller
Contains game phases, game engine and user command to start the game and to execute the commands.
entities
Contains basic entities used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.
entities.orders
Contains all the orders which the user provides during game phase.
